entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
